about_the_game:
Summary

Visitors hear rumors of an immortal town and travel to "Neverland," a mysterious town in a rural region of Japan. At first glance, it appears to be an ordinary local city, but when visitors bring up the topic, the mayor assigns them a peculiar task. The task? Just a simple race. Ostensibly, it’s meant as a tour for potential residents, but something about it feels suspicious.

How to Play

This is a dice-based board game where players roll dice and circle the course for a set number of laps. Supporting local multiplayer, up to four players can compete together with just one game copy. Players utilize special abilities, known as "Skill," to tackle various challenges. Detailed screen instructions can be accessed from the gear icon in the upper right corner after launching the game.

The game is primarily mouse-operated, but pressing the START button on a gamepad displays a virtual cursor, which can be moved using the left stick (R shoulder button accelerates, X button for decision). Enjoy original music composed for this game and immerse yourself in the surreal world of a fictional Japan.

Please note: The settings, characters, and events in this story are entirely fictional and bear no relation to real-world incidents, individuals, religions, or organizations.

- Ending: 1 type

- Estimated Playtime: 1 hour (when playing with four players and completing one lap)

- Controls (Mouse or Gamepad):

- Drag the cursor to the button and left-click to select.

- Pressing START on the gamepad displays a virtual cursor (accelerated with R shoulder, X button for decision).

- Save Function: None

Streaming Guidelines

1. Regarding Streams and Gameplay Videos

- Prior notification is not required for streaming or creating and uploading gameplay videos.

- Content creation is allowed freely, whether monetized or not.

2. Guidelines

- Please refrain from making defamatory or aggressive remarks toward others.

- Treat the game content and other players with respect.

name: アネモネ / Anemone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 (4th generation or later)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: This is a board game set in the fictional Japanese city of "Neverland." Enjoy local multiplayer with simple mouse-based controls. Original music and an unusual world await you.
